fields.name: Ransomware
fields.description: Ransomware is a type of malicious software designed to block access to a computer system until a sum of money is paid.

fields.name: Malware
fields.description: Malware is any software intentionally designed to cause damage to a computer, server, client, or computer network.

fields.name: Phishing
fields.description: Phishing is a type of online fraud that attempts to steal sensitive information such as usernames, passwords, and credit card details by masquerading as a trustworthy entity in an electronic communication.

fields.name: Data Breach
fields.description: A data breach is a security incident in which sensitive, confidential, or otherwise protected data is accessed or disclosed without authorization.
